column1: I was overcharged on my last bill and the refund process was slow.
The support agent was very helpful and resolved my issue quickly.
My package arrived late and the courier was unresponsive.
The product quality is excellent, but the design could be better.
The website kept crashing when I tried to log in from my mobile.
The subscription fee is too expensive for the features offered.
The customer service team did not respond to my emails.
The delivery was fast, but the package was damaged.
I love the new features in the app, very user-friendly interface!
The instructions on the website were confusing and hard to follow.
